package.description: Data Validator Definitions define validation patterns for verifying form field and custom control (e.g.: Hemi.ui.wideselect) input matches expected patterns and allowable characters. Patterns may be chained together and defined with a meaningful description for end users.

class.name: service
class.description: This service defines validation patterns for use by the Hemi Data Form Service.

method.name: addNewPattern
method.param: The type of validation: bool, replace, or none.
For validation type of bool, the comparison value may be "true" or "false".
Regular expression to use to match the input value.
Replacement value to use for the matched expression.
Bit indicating whether null values are allowed.
Error message to describe the expected pattern. e.g.: Phone numbers should be numbers and hyphens only.
Array of pattern ids that should be executed prior to this pattern. e.g.: The trim-ends pattern has a comparison of none and includes the trim-start and trim-end patterns.
method.description: Creates a new implementation definition. An implementation definition maps a node name to a specified constructor.

index.description: Data Validator Definitions define validation patterns for verifying form field and custom control (e.g.: Hemi.ui.wideselect) input matches expected patterns and allowable characters. Patterns may be chained together and defined with a meaningful description for end users.
